AvalancheScenario
public class AvalancheScenario extends AbstractScenario

    • ChainParentSelection

      public static ArrayList<AvalancheTx> ChainParentSelection(HashSet<AvalancheTx> TSet)
      Performs Chain Parent Selection on a set of known Avalanche transactions.
      Parameters:
      TSet - The set of known Avalanche transactions for parent selection.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the selected parent transaction(s).

    • parentSelection

      public static ArrayList<AvalancheTx> parentSelection(AvalancheNode node, HashSet<AvalancheTx> knownSet)
      Performs parent selection for generating Avalanche transactions based on consensus preferences.
      Parameters:
      node - The Avalanche node for which parent selection is performed.
      knownSet - The set of known Avalanche transactions.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the selected parent transaction(s).

    • schedulingStartTime

      private List<AvalancheNode> schedulingStartTime(List<AvalancheNode> nodes, double maxTime)
      Schedules start times for Avalanche nodes based on a random double within a specified maximum time.
      Parameters:
      nodes - The list of Avalanche nodes to be scheduled.
      maxTime - The maximum time for scheduling start times.
      Returns:
      A list of Avalanche nodes with scheduled start times.

    • run

      public void run() throws IOException
      Description copied from class: AbstractScenario
      When called starts the simulation and runs everything to the end of simulation. This also logs events using the logger object.
      Overrides:
      run in class AbstractScenario
      Throws:
      IOException

    • simulationStopCondition

      public boolean simulationStopCondition()
      Description copied from class: AbstractScenario
      runs before each event and checks if simulation should stop.
      Specified by:
      simulationStopCondition in class AbstractScenario
      Returns:
      true if simulation should not continue to execution of next event.

    • writeDAGLocalLedger

      protected void writeDAGLocalLedger(ArrayList<ArrayList<AvalancheTx>> txs)
      Writes the local ledger information of an Avalanche Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) to the output.
      Parameters:
      txs - The ArrayList of ArrayLists containing Avalanche transactions organized by levels in the DAG.

    • getAverageConsensusTime

      public static double getAverageConsensusTime()
      Calculates the average consensus time based on the recorded times of confirmed blocks.
      Returns:
      The calculated average consensus time, or 0.0 if no consensus times are available.
